text: Sila namni fokkataan hojii isaa isaaf bareechifame, kan gaarii taasisee ishee ilaalu (isa karaa qajeelaa irra jiruu wajjin wal qixa taâ€™aa)? Dhugumatti, Allaahn nama fedhe ni jallisa; nama fedhe immoo ni qajeelchaKanaafuu isaan irratti lubbuun kee sheenaadhaan akka hin baaneDhugumatti, Allaahn waan isaan hojjatan beekaadha
